name: City Defender (Trijam 174)
description:
Defend your city. Click on a blue unit to select them, then click where you want them to move to. Only one unit can move at a time. If the red army destroys your entire city wall you lose. If the red army enters your city you lose.

Entry for Trijam 174. Make a game in 3 hours. The theme was "Game Based on a Quote". Made using microstudio.dev with Quick library. I made the code and sprites myself during the 3-hour timelimit.
